thread.title: Police Officer Investigates His Doberman Pinscher’s ‘Crime Scene’
thread.title_full: Police Officer Investigates His Doberman Pinscher’s ‘Crime Scene’

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Police Officer Investigates His Doberman Pinscher’s ‘Crime Scene’
text:
Police Officer Investigates His Doberman Pinscher’s ‘Crime Scene’   
Kruz the Doberman Pinscher wasn’t sure if he was in trouble for tearing up his Valentine’s Day present or not. After thorough investigate by his human dad (who happens to be a police officer), they come to the conclusion that Kruz is innocent of any crime. For once, a “guilty dog” is found innocent! 
Share this cute video with your friends and family!
